header.title: Hello, I'm Giacomo
header.subtitle: Web Developer
header.description: Web Developer con la passione per la tecnologia, in Sardegna

aboutMe.smallDescription: Hi! I am a Web Developer with a passion for technology.
aboutMe.description: I have been working in the IT field for years and have an excellent knowledge of web programming. Throughout my career, I have developed front-end applications, hybrid mobile applications, RESTful APIs, and automated development processes through continuous integration and continuous deployment.

frontend.title: Front-End
frontend.description: From mockup to code, I create pixel-perfect interfaces, websites, and web applications using the latest technologies available and following the main usability principles.

backend.title: Back-End
backend.description: From requirements analysis to code writing, I can develop fast and stable applications, automate processes, implement RESTful APIs, and accelerate deployment using continuous integration and continuous deployment techniques.
